Job_Requisition_EnabledObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Job_Requisition_EnabledObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Job_Requisition_EnabledObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

description: Reference to the job requisition. If left blank, the web service will try to fill this with the job requisition entered in the Job Requisition Reference ID field.

validation.validation: You must enter either a Job Requisition Reference or a Job Requisition Reference ID.

Assign_Recruiting_Self-Schedule_Calendar.description: A unique identifier to reference a Job Requisition.

Recruiting_Self-Schedule_CalendarObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Recruiting_Self-Schedule_CalendarObjectI.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Recruiting_Self-Schedule_CalendarObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

validation.validation: [Assign Recruiting Self-Schedule Calendar Recruiting Stage Mapping Error Message]
You can only assign active calendars to a job requisition. Remove [Inactive Calendars].

description: This holds the calendar assignment data.
